location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 145: Lieutenant-Colonel Samuel Hennell, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to Arthur Malet, Chief Secretary to Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Samuel Hennell encloses copies of his letters to His Excellency Lieutenant-Colonel Justin Sheil, Her Majesty's Minister at the Court of Tehran. The letters (nos. 132, 139, 142 and 143) are not included here, but they do appear as individual items earlier in the file (see ff.48-49, f.54, ff.56-57 and ff.58-61 respectively).
